```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

source('R/readISCN3.R')

dataDir <- '~/Dropbox (UFL)/Research/Datasets/ISCN3'
annotationFilename <- 'data/ISCN3Annotations.csv'
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
iscn.ls <- readISCN3(dataDir = dataDir, annotationFilename = annotationFilename, format = 'long', verbose = TRUE)
```

# isolate iscn 4 studies and variables

```{r}
temp <- iscn.ls$long %>%
  # remove iscn calculated soc stocks
  filter(!str_detect(string = soc_id, pattern  = '^ISCN SOC')) %>%
  # remove NRCS data since we will update later
  filter(!str_detect(string = dataset_id, pattern = '^NRCS'))
```
